title: Onda V712 Quad Core 4Core Android Kitkat 4.4.2 firmware
description:
V712 quad-core-version _v4.4_v1 beta firmware

Product Info (firmwares):
 <a href="
http://www.onda.cn/Tablet/ProductInfo.aspx?ProductId=246&d=down" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.onda.cn/Tablet/ProductInfo.aspx?ProductId=246&d=down</a>
 <a href="
http://www.onda.cn/Support/Search.aspx?keyword=v712" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.onda.cn/Support/Search.aspx?keyword=v712</a>


The site is in chinese so I used Google Translate. It's very easy to use, it translate the whole site in that language you want. (If you want to check it out)

I have a Onda V712 Quad Core V1 and I have upgrade my tablet to Kitkat 4.4.2 with this firmware. Note that this is a beta! I had Jelly Bean 4.1.1 before and I think that this beta of Kitkat 4.4.2 is much better and smother than Jelly Bean 4.1.1.

You need to install PhoenixSuit (v1.0.5_ENG) or OndaSuite (v02.03.00 chinese) on your computer and install the firware with any of these two programs. I used PhoenixSuit (v1.0.5_ENG) because it's in english.

I used this guide to update with PhoenixSuit: http://www.arctablet.com/blog/featured/phoenixsuit-flashing-tutorial-onda-v972-v812-allwinner-a31-tablets/

The tablet will be in chinese after the update so you need to change to your language.
Here is a youtube guide you can use to change the language:


This is the description translated from chinese to english with Google Translate from www.onda.cn:
